messages.title: Choose the candidate who puts Warrington North first
messages.content: Helen Jones is the only candidate who will put Warrington North first. She has a record of defending our interests, and standing up for local people. She lives here with her family - she’s one of us.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To fight to save our A&E and protect services at our local hospital.
Fight for more funding for our schools which are facing huge cuts from the Tories.
To oppose any unnecessary development on this important green space.
To campaign for secure jobs and a Living Wage for everyone in Warrington North.

issues.education: Fight for more funding for our schools which are facing huge cuts from the Tories.
issues.environment: Oppose unnecessary development on Peel Hall, protecting our green spaces.
issues.health: Fight to save our A&E and protect services at our local hospital.
issues.labourEmployment: Campaign for secure jobs and a Living Wage for everyone in Warrington North.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour's Helen Jones is the only candidate who will put Warrington North first. She has a record of defending our interests, and standing up for local people.

community.content: Oppose unnecessary development on Peel Hall, protecting our green spaces.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have always tried to keep the promises I have made and to act on the issues you have asked me to take up whether in Parliament or Westminster. I have always done my best to help local people with problems and issues they have raised.

contactInformation.address: Helen Jones Labour Candidate for Warrington North, Gilbert Wakefield House 67 Bewsey Street, Warrington WA2 7JQ

examples: Helen Jones is the only candidate who will put Warrington North first.
She has a record of defending our interests, and standing up for local people.
I have always tried to keep the promises I have made.
Local people have a right to ask - can she really be trusted with our community?
Oppose unnecessary development on Peel Hall, protecting our green spaces.
The Tories are a blank cheque to let them destroy our NHS.
Risking our children’s futures and threatening the jobs and security of workers and the elderly.
Local people have a right to ask - can she really be trusted with our community?
The Tory candidate has a record of backing Halton schools, Widnes businesses, young people in Merseyside and investment in Greater Manchester.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: She lives here with her family - she’s one of us.
